title: Research Report
description:
The B.A. Arch Research Report is a culminating academic exercise in the final year of B.A. Arch study. It is intended to evaluate the students’ ability to carry out independent research under the supervision of a faculty member. Students will identify subject in the area of architecture theory/ history or Urban Design/ study.



The report will be forged and realized under the History, Theory and Criticism or Urban Studies Research Teaching Groups.
